name: Speester
description:
Controls - Click & Drag mouse to fling the square.

Press 'escape' to open the pause menu.

Options - Invert Controls: if enabled the square will be shot away from the mouse instead of towards. 

Sensitivity: Choose how much the square moves with the mouse.

Warning - While you can full-screen the game, I wouldn't recommend it as it seems to cause some lag.

I have only tested this game on Windows in Firefox and Chrome, there may be compatibility issues with other operating systems and browsers, if so, please let me know so I can figure out what I can do to fix it!

This is the first game that I've finished, it's far from perfect but I'm just glad to have something that I can share! Any feedback is appreciated and as always, I hope you enjoy the game!
